modName: Harkon The Khajiit Follower And Weapon
summary: This is my first mod but it includes a Khajiit follower and a weapon that you can use.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod but it includes a Khajiit follower and a weapon that you can use.
The Khajiit follower was in the imperial army in the great war and he fought to the very end of the war when they put out a treaty he put his imperial sword down and ran he first ran to elywer but his family wasn't there he search and search he asked a fellow Khajiit and he said an assassin murdered his family he was very angry then he tracked them down in SKYRIM we he slaughter them and found ebony armour no helmet though but with a legendary sword which absorbs health but more than that then he flee to dragon bridge to the Penitus Oculatus Outpost and he helps anyone who has no family THAT YOU ON SKYRIM BECAUSE WHERE ARE YOUR FAMILY.
REQUIRES: SKYUI BUT NO DLC

CHECK OUT MY YOUTUBE CHANNEL
https://www.youtube.com/user/jJackTheGamer

WHERE YOU CAN FIND HIM
go to the Penitus Oculatus Outpost in dragon bridge
author: Jack TheGamer
